Common.Highlight.Common.Text: 5- story office building with two-story atrium lobby

Within 5 minutes from P.F. Changs, J. Alexander’s, Mitchell’s Seafood, Fleming’s Steakhouse and many others
Suite 115 - 2,205 RSF

$13.95 RSF + Suite Electric
